Watch this VIDEO&gt;&gt;&nbsp;<a href="https://youtu.be/H5ioYMO-9c4" target="_blank">https://youtu.be/H5ioYMO-9c4</a></p><p><br></p><p>All creatives invited! Want to host an event or a class? Make a movie? Dance? Write? Sing? Act? Paint? What do you want to create? Do it at our 7,000sqft venue, aerial gym and studio space in Grant Park.&nbsp;We host a round-table discussion every Tuesday meant to connect creatives to one another, and we offer amazing free space to host your creative idea.</p><p>Submit your idea on http://<a href="http://www.Mixdeity.com/idea" target="_blank">Mixdeity.com/idea</a> and then join us for introductions and team building at 8:00pm every Tuesday at Grant Park Manor. Stay late for drinks, open jam, spotlight performances, DJ &amp; open mic. It's Free. Every Tuesday it's Creators Club. Join us.</p><p><br></p><p>ABOUT MIXDEITY STUDIOS</p><p>Mixdeity is a developing grassroots arts organization dedicated to serve as a resource intersection and support system for creatives and entrepreneurs in music, film, arts &amp; humanities. We are artists supporting artists. Please subscribe at <a href="http://www.Mixdeity.com" target="_blank">http://www.Mixdeity.com</a>&nbsp;for secret password access to our venue, studios, network and resources. </p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://Patreon.com/Mixdeity" target="_blank">http://Patreon.com/Mixdeity</a></p><p><br></p><p>MORE CLUBS at Mixdeity MEDIA Studios!&nbsp;(What's the password?)</p><p><a href="https://www.meetup.com/ALL-THINGS-MUSIC-mixdeity-studios" target="_blank">https://www.meetup.com/ALL-THINGS-MUSIC-mixdeity-studios</a>&nbsp;</p><p><a href="https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-WRITERS" target="_blank">https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-WRITERS</a></p><p><a href="https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-MOVEMENT" target="_blank">https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-MOVEMENT</a></p><p><a href="https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-TALENT" target="_blank">https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-TALENT</a></p><p><a href="https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-VISUAL-ARTS" target="_blank">https://www.meetup.com/mixdeity-VISUAL-ARTS</a></p><p><a href="http://www.mixdeity.com/" target="_blank">www.Mixdeity.com</a>&nbsp;| 305-570-3000 | info@mixdeity.com</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">1231 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; All experience levels.</p> 
<p>We do it all: Half day rides, Overnight trips, Iron Butt rides, Mountain Twisties, Bike Nights, Charity Rides, Track Days, Motorcycle Shows.</p> 
<p>Sport bikes to Cruisers welcome! Your motorcycle needs to go at least 15mph over the speed limit without overheating, please. Our usual ride start near Atlanta and go for about 4 hours in different scenic routes. Safety of our rides is priority, but we may open it up when conditions permit.</p> 
<p>&lt;br&gt; &lt;br&gt;Join us on Facebook: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/AMR.GA/" class="linkified">https://www.facebook.com/groups/AMR.GA/</a> &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;</p>

All skill levels are welcome. Activities will mostly be around Atlanta and North Georgia and will vary in difficulty and length. &lt;br&gt;</p><p>Looking to meet people? This is a great laid-back group where you'll be sure to have fun and make friends, all while staying in shape or getting in better shape and clearing your mind in the great outdoors.</p><p>Dogs are welcome on hikes, but note that a small number of trails will not allow them, and these will be clearly noted beforehand.</p><p>If you have any suggestions of hiking locations, feel free to let me know!!</p><p>Disclaimer:By participating in this voluntary group you expressly waive any and all claims that could arise from any of the activities planned to include travel to and from and during the trip and to understand the organizer and assistant organizer or event host do not assume liability for personal injuries, death, destruction or loss of personal property. Social and Activity Group" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">35UP! Social and Activity Group</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Atlanta, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="35UP! Social and Activity Group" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>This group is a Social group&nbsp;of adults&nbsp;in Atlanta ages 35 and up that want to get out of the house, try new things and new places, and have a lot of fun while meeting other great people. This group welcomes everyone looking to expand their social and professional circles. We will hold different types of social events&nbsp;throughout the&nbsp;month designed to introduce you to friends in your age range.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Many folks just join a ton of meetup groups and actually never attend a meetup. Many don't attend due to fear of the unknown, anxiety, don't like showing up alone in a room full of new people.</p>
<p>We've all been there. The hardest part is getting in your car to go. I've had people tell me they stay in their cars for 10 minutes anxious to get out and walk into the meetup. But once they do, the realize it's not a big deal and everyone is there for the same reason - to make new friends. It's like anything else, if you don't take the first step, you might just miss out on the journey.</p>
<p>So if you are ready to attend your first Meetup - make 2016 the year for you to resolve and get out to make new friends. In over 8 years, I have seen friendships, marriages and new jobs all stem from meetup. It's a great social tool - but only if you use it!</p>
<p>Come join the fun! </p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">21578 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; </svg></div></div></div></button></div></div></a></div></div><div class="w-full"><div data-testid="group-card" class="py-3 border-t border-gray3 bg-white cursor-pointer flex flex-col"><a class="flex hover:no-underline" data-element-name="-groupCard" id="group-card-in-search-results" href="https://www.meetup.com/Beer-Brunch-and-Books/"><div class="d1xev8qx mr-4 relative hidden sm:block"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27178%27%20height=%27100%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Beer, Brunch and Books! A Women Only Group" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">Beer, Brunch and Books! A Women Only Group</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Atlanta, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Beer, Brunch and Books! A Women Only Group" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>This group is open to all <b>ladies (This is a women's only book club)</b>&nbsp;who want to have some good conversations about our monthly book over a few brews and brunch! I don't know about you, but I love brunch. Whoever came up with the idea to combine lunch food with breakfast is a genius. I also love beer! Being in Atlanta it's so easy to find great craft beer. There are so many local breweries to enjoy and restaurants are starting to get on board the craft beer train! Woohoo!</p>
<p>Lastly, I love book clubs. I hate when I read a great, or not so great, book and don't have anyone to talk or vent to about it! All I want is for someone to understand! It's like watching a really intense episode of your favorite show, but not having any friends that watch it. So you just sit there thinking about all the great moments keeping it to yourself. Or telling your cat.. I've done it. It's fine. So book clubs are great! <br>Beer, Brunch and Books. 3 things that I love coming together. So I have decided to start this club and hope to find others out there that share the same interests! We would meet once a month and talk about our monthly book over some craft beer (or wine if you prefer. Or some sweet tea!) while snacking on delicious food from our favorite brunch spots around the city. We may mix it up and grab dinner on a week night, or have a book swap at a brewery! There are no limits to the fun we will have.</p>
<p>If this sounds like something you would be interested in, then please join! If you're new to Atlanta or have been here your whole life and just want to meet some new, awesome girls- join! If you think you might enjoy it, but aren't sure- join anyways! I swear this is going to be great.</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">1652 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2718%27%20height=%2718%27/%3e" style="display: block; </svg></div></div></div></button></div></div></a></div></div><div class="w-full"><div data-testid="group-card" class="py-3 border-t border-gray3 bg-white cursor-pointer flex flex-col"><a class="flex hover:no-underline" data-element-name="-groupCard" id="group-card-in-search-results" href="https://www.meetup.com/Full-Moon-Drum-Circle-in-East-Cobb-Park/"><div class="d1xev8qx mr-4 relative hidden sm:block"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27178%27%20height=%27100%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Full Moon Drum Circle in East Cobb Park" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">Full Moon Drum Circle in East Cobb Park</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Marietta, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Full Moon Drum Circle in East Cobb Park" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>This drum circle started in May of 2013 and has been growing ever since ..&nbsp; Due to popular demand we have two meetings a month, every 2nd&nbsp;and 4th Sat at East Cobb Park off Roswell Rd. in Marietta, 1/4 mile N. of the QT station corner Roswell/Canton Rd. </p>
<p>I initially started this DC as a local alternative (and in addition) to the Land Trust DC in L5P which has been around for a very long time. We've recently changed our schedule to accommodate our members who also like to attend the Land Trust DC .</p>
<p>We meet in the Gazebo overlooking the park off the upper parking lot. This is a community drum circle for people interested in easy drumming and feeling the rhythm / spirit of the drum. Dancers,&nbsp;performers and kindred spirits are always welcome !</p>
<p> All percussion - and related instruments are welcome. We've had didjeridoos, udu's and other instruments in our group ..&nbsp;We are&nbsp;very international with members from many Nations bringing in local flavor and rhythms from around the world.</p>
<p> We start Sat at 6pm (Nov -&nbsp;Apr) and 7pm (May-Oct), every 2nd and 4th Saturday (weather permitting)(we won't schedule if it is really raining hard / snowing or under 45F ..for the hardy souls ..) so please check our site or call me for update/ info.</p>
<p> It's a good idea to bring a&nbsp;citronella candle in the summertime (skeeters are hungry)&nbsp;but we always have several fire torches burning at night to scare the buggers away and add a nice 'fire pit' feeling to the gazebo ..</p>
<p>We're asking for a donation of $ 2.00 per person or family to cover the costs for advertising/ meetup fees, torch fuel, printing etc. and have a donation box in the gazebo.</p>
<p>Supporting membership is optional (and greatly appreciated) at $ 24.00 per year per person/ family.</p>
<p>For info call Heino @ 678 520 3549 or email at suntana2561@hotmail.com</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">577 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Black Run" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>Black Run is Atlanta's latest African-American jogging meetup. We are Black professionals who love to run! If you're looking for friendly people to run, sweat and enjoy the beauty of this city with...this is the place!</p><p><br></p><p>Connect with us on Instagram for running motivation! @officialblackrun</p><p><br></p><p>For those of you who have asked how to contribute toward our weekly snacks or just give a general donation to the group, our CashApp is $OfficialBlackRun</p><p><br></p><p>***Please see the link below for Black Run’s waiver of liability***</p><p><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1iwig2FXuAT8ZYpz2TiAwdlSRShcheI8_eeH-jpAnozo/edit" target="_blank">Black Run Waiver</a></p><p>BLACK RUN’S RULES</p><p>1) Be SAFE!!! First and foremost. Watch out for yourself and for others around you. (We recommend that if you run with any audio devices, that you make sure you are still able to hear and respond to others and to your environment).</p><p>2) You and any guest you bring must read and agree to the waiver (see link above) before participation in any activity with Black Run.</p><p>3) Black Run expressly prohibits any form of intimidation or harassment based on race, color, gender, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or any other status. (EVERYONE is welcome)</p><p>4) Have FUN!!! This is a fun group. Meet new people and network while getting in a good workout!</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">1980 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; I started this group to meet others who have similar goals and could benefit from accountability partners.</p><p>The group will meet at 7:00 each morning, Monday-Friday (additional times are forthcoming), and walk five miles around the mountain.</p><p>We're just getting started, but the goal is for everyone to get healthier! max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Divi Atlanta" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>This group is for anyone who uses (or is interested in learning more about) WordPress and the Divi theme by Elegant Themes. It's also a great place to meet fellow members of the Divi Community, known affectionately as the Divi Nation. Join us to learn, make friends, and network with local designers, developers, DIYers, business owners, and more.</p><p><strong>ABOUT OUR MEETINGS</strong></p><p>Our Meetup is held from 6:30 - 8:00 pm on the fourth Thursday of every month. <strong><em>Because of COVID-19 social distancing guidelines, the Meetups will temporarily be virtual&nbsp;ZOOM meetings instead of in-person.</em></strong></p><p>The interactive meetings start with a quick discussion of the latest Divi theme updates, followed by a guest speaker presentation or facilitated discussion. The presentations are designed for beginners and/or intermediates to learn and customize the Divi theme. WordPress users of all levels are encouraged to join!</p><p>We include time for networking and troubleshooting.<strong><em> </em></strong></p><p><strong>OUR ASPIRATIONS &amp; GOALS</strong></p><p>1. We aspire to build a local, personal community for Divi users.</p><p>2. We aspire to empower our members through training, workshops, discussions, and more.</p><p>3. The end goal of our Meetup group is to increase the confidence of our members and their competence in web design when using WordPress and Divi.</p><p>If you share these aspirations and goals, then you will enjoy being part of our Divi Atlanta Meetup group!</p><p><strong>WANT TO BE A SPEAKER?</strong></p><p>If you would like to be a guest speaker at a future Meetup, send a message through our Meetup page to our co-organizers Mark Treager or Cammy Farone. Include your proposed topic and date(s) you are available (our meetings are held on the fourth Thursday of the month).</p><p><strong>PRIVACY POLICY</strong></p><p>During our meetups there will be photos taken to post in our Meetup group and on the Elegant Themes blog. By attending, you agree to the use of any or all photos.</p><p><strong>SPONSORS</strong></p><p>Our Divi Atlanta Meetup group is in association with <a href="https://www.elegantthemes.com/" target="_blank"><strong>Elegant Themes</strong></a> and generously sponsored by<strong> </strong><a href="https://www.csmediagroup.com" target="_blank"><strong>Cornerstone Media Group</strong></a> and <a href="https://www.atlantatechpark.com/" target="_blank"><strong>Atlanta Tech Park</strong></a>.</p><p>- - - - - -</p><p><strong>WHAT IS DIVI? </strong></p><p>Divi is more than just a WordPress theme, it's a completely new website building platform that replaces the standard WordPress post editor with a vastly superior visual editor. It can be enjoyed by design professionals and newcomers alike, giving you the power to create spectacular designs with surprising ease and efficiency. For more info go to <a href="https://www.elegantthemes.com/gallery/divi/" target="_blank">www.elegantthemes.com/gallery/divi</a>. This Meetup welcomes WordPress users and Divi lovers of all levels!</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">371 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; <p>This club is family friendly. No drinking or drugs allowed. Smoking is allowed, but is discouraged.</p>
<p>No weapons of any kind are allowed on our events. Pocket knives are fine. Nothing more.</p>
<p>Our events are dog friendly. Provided your dog is well behaved, it is welcome on all of our trips. Events that are not dog dog friendly will be marked as such.</p>
<p><br></p>
<p>Note: by joining our events, you understand you are taking your safety into your own hands.&nbsp; Although we take safety seriously, you are ultimately responsible for yourself.&nbsp; Don't sue us if you slip and fall :).</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">3321 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; Or, maybe you always wanted to be the voice of a cartoon character. Or, maybe you want to do something creative with your career and didn't know you had options. This Meet Up structures the training so you can start a career in the voice-over/voice-acting career.

Our industry-leading voice acting coaches have vowed to be in service to the voice acting industry and the people in and around it. This group was created so we can build a community of voice actors in the Atlanta area. To provide ongoing education in a field most people didn't know exists or how to get into. Our goal is to create purpose in people's lives and fun while doing so!

At The Voice Acting Institute, our mission is to provide education for **seekers** &amp; **doers** that support successful careers!

Learn more about My Voice Acting Coach here: www.voiceactinginstitute.com</p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">53 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; We go out several times a month and would love to expand our circle of friends. We go to festivals, participate and watch sporting events, movies, dinners, getting outside and getting some exercise, hiking, biking, camping, etc.</p> 
<p>We prefer to host a Meetup group that is oriented towards women. It makes way for a more comfortable setting and could make everyone feel more welcome. The group is private and for membership approval, you will need to provide your name and a recognizable photo of yourself. Welcome and let’s meet up ladies!😊</p> 
<p>Cancellation and No Show policy - Please note due to needing to update venues of party size and make adjustments to events, cancellation deadline is 24 hours prior to the event. If you are a no show or cancel within 24 hours for 3 times without reasonable explanation you will be removed from the group.</p> 
<p>This is a free social group designed to foster friendships, not a free dating site. Please do not send mass private dating messages, post in the forum looking to date, or sexually harass people at the events.</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">2005 members · Private<button tabindex="0" aria-label="Only members of this group can see its full content, including details about its members and events. inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">Crossing Party Lines: Atlanta, GA</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Atlanta, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Crossing Party Lines: Atlanta, GA" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>Civil, respectful conversation with people with different political views?&nbsp;</p><p>Yes, it is possible. We’re doing it and you can, too.</p><p><br></p><p>Crossing Party Lines is YOUR brave space to meet and talk with people you disagree with and may not even understand. You might have fun!</p><p><br></p><p>Our events include:</p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;- DISCUSSIONS: We meet as small groups where you can talk to real people about the issues that divide us. Share your unique insights, encounter new perspectives and new ways of looking at the world, and experience what it's like to feel heard and understood.&nbsp;</p><p>You'll find that it is possible to disagree in a way that leaves you feeling true to yourself and your beliefs without losing your friends or your cool.</p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;- WORKSHOPS: We teach the skills you need to effectively talk across differences. You will learn ways to foster curiosity and invite listening, acquire strategies for overcoming common communication barriers, and develop the confidence to talk politics with people you know, live, and work with.</p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;- COMMUNITY EVENTS: We’re not just about talking – we’re also about community. We&nbsp;host game nights, screen videos, share books, and offer many other ways of connecting across differences.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>At all events, trained facilitators set the tone of the discussion and help the group build trust. Come see what civil, respectful conversation is like. Who knows, you might make friends with someone you disagree with!</p><p><br></p><p>More about Crossing Party Lines:</p><p><br></p><p>We are a national nonprofit with chapters in eight states.&nbsp;Because we believe that the success of America’s unique democracy relies on the diversity of our viewpoints, we encourage people of all political views and parties to join and participate.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Come learn, explore, practice, and grow with us. Join this grassroots movement and become the change in your community.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Note: Due to COVID, most of our events are online. Unless otherwise stated, events are open to all Crossing Party Lines chapters, giving you a chance to interact with people from all over the country.</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">223 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; We do host activities for children, but please note that any children present at a Meetup must be supervised by a parent or guardian.</p>
<p><span>We also have a google group and are on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram which we use to communicate and discuss activities. More info (and others ways to support us) <a href="http://decaturmakers.org/">here</a>.</span> <br></p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">4065 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; </svg></div></div></div></button></div></div></a></div></div><div class="w-full"><div data-testid="group-card" class="py-3 border-t border-gray3 bg-white cursor-pointer flex flex-col"><a class="flex hover:no-underline" data-element-name="-groupCard" id="group-card-in-search-results" href="https://www.meetup.com/BlackMenRead/"><div class="d1xev8qx mr-4 relative hidden sm:block"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27178%27%20height=%27100%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Black Men Read" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">Black Men Read</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Atlanta, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Black Men Read" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>Black Men Read is a statement to break stereotypes around the perceived lack of literacy and narrow-minded views of black men. This group is for brothers who seek to expand their horizons through reading, as well as the reflections that come along with it. Each month, attending members suggest a shortlist of books and we discuss the selected book the following month. As organizer, I do not vote during these meetups, so most book selections are driven by the members, although I do arbitrarily personally pick a few books throughout the year for discussion. &lt;br&gt;</p> 
<p>We learn from one another, we challenge each other and work to understand different perspectives. Culturally, it’s about taking knowledge and putting action to it in our every day lives. </p> 
<p>Demographically, the general perspective towards black men worldwide has not been one of intellectualism, favoring limited avenues of exposure to who we are and what we represent. This group's existence defies stereotypes by creating a dynamic where we create the narrative and give back to our community while doing so. Thus, in 2019 we are kicking off our Black Men Read Scholarship fund and many more initiatives. </p> 
<p>-Ja'Rod</p> 
<p>&lt;br&gt;</p>

display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; Most of our activities take place in Alpharetta and Atlanta. We accept those of all races and castes who identify as:</p>
<p>•&nbsp;Female, or&nbsp;</p>
<p>• Were designated female at birth and identify as gender-queer, non-binary, or gender non-conforming, or&nbsp;</p>
<p>• Were designated male at birth and identify as gender-queer, non-binary, or gender non-conforming.<br></p>
<p>Most of our events revolve around cultural geek/nerd interests.</p>
<p>Connect with us on social media here:</p>
<p><b>Facebook Group</b> (here we chat between events, plan new events, and create last-minute get-togethers that aren't always posted on the official calendar) You must be eligible to be a part of our Meetup group in order to gain entrance into this private group:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/ladygeeksatl/">https://www.facebook.com/groups/ladygeeksatl/</a></p>

inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>The Atlanta Business Network Meetup (A.B.N) is a community of active and aspiring small business owners and entrepreneurs. A.B.N holds inexpensive, high-quality seminars and networking events on a regular basis. These events help small business owners, entrepreneurs and marketing professionals learn, network and grow. They learn new tactics, tools and techniques. They network with like-minded people. They grow their networks, their businesses and their characters. A.B.N’s seminars address just about every business topic imaginable including traditional, online and mobile marketing, personal development, social media, sales, networking, raising capital, crowd sourcing, gamification, branding, search engine optimization, web design and much much more. Start growing your business or advancing your career today by checking us out. The best way to do this is to attend one of our meetings. A.B.N is a branch of Entrepreneurs International Network. Please email the organizer of this group to become an event host if you like to hold local events to for entrepreneurs.</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">6526 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; Join us as we travel to metro Atlanta's best fishing spots, retreats, and destination excursions. Our goal is to introduce and promote fishing to the beginner and advanced women angler. LFC offers continuing education seminars in a range of experiences including classes on in shore lake fishing, casting, fly fishing, and bait/lure technique offered throughout the year.

We welcome all ladies who are interested in fishing for fun, relaxation, or skill building.

GO Sports Unlimited combines the relaxed sport of kickball and other social activities with social networking to create a fun and active way for adults to network, meet new people, enjoy friends, and play in a comfortable, non-intimidating atmosphere. Whether you have not played since 4th grade or are a seasoned veteran, this experience is for you. Beginners, experts and everyone in-between are more than welcome to join - our only requirement is that you are at least 21 years of age and are wanting to have a fun time!

GO Kickball &amp; GO Sports Unlimited run award-winning, well-organized, reliable, and fun co-ed adult leagues in Atlanta for 12 years and counting! We provide all game equipment, certified referees and field supervisors, team t-shirts.&nbsp;

Visit us at www.GoKickball.com for league information &amp; to sign up!</p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">1821 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; Primary activities include hiking, mountaineering, camping, biking. Sports are not included.<br><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; -----------------------------<br><br>DISCOVER YOUR NATURE! ELEVATE YOUR MIND, BODY AND SPIRIT !<br><br>\ STAY ACTIVE WITH NATURE. MEDITATE WITH NATURE /<br><br>&gt;&gt;&gt; BE ADVENTUROUS. EXPLORE A NEW FRONTIER WITH &gt;&gt;&gt; DESI OUTDOORS &gt;&gt;&gt;<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; -----------------------------<br>Doeres continuously engage in various Outdoor activities for enriching, strengthening and balancing mind, body and spirit in harmony with Nature. Activities are low to moderate risk,moderate to strenuous difficulty, adventurous to challenging, with a mix of exploration, recreation, learning, fun, freedom and building a better Self &amp; Society. Some activities involve kids and families.<br><br>We are active year-around, enjoying all seasons and outdoor terrains of the US. Organizers expect new members to join for active participation in group meetups as per the mission above and not for increased meetup memberships, business or professional networking, socialization etc. We keep the group small to outdoors active members and No Attendance within 3 months of joining removes you from the group. We can adequately prepare you for Outdoor activities during all seasons.<br><br>Please read the Disclaimer (&nbsp;<a href="http://www.meetup.com/Desi-Outdoors-Enrichment-and-Recreational-Activities/pages/Disclaimer_of_No_Liability/">http://www.meetup.com/Desi-Outdoors-Enrichment-and-Recreational-Activities/pages/Disclaimer_of_No_Liability/</a>&nbsp;) page. <p>Dancing Dancing and more Dancing. <br> Meet other locals who love Salsa dancing and spend the night out dancing Salsa, Merengue, Bachata, Reggaeton, and other Latin Dances. <br> The Atlanta Salsa Meetup group is a social dance group open to dancers of all levels.</p>
<p> <br> LOOKING FOR A SALSA CLASS, A SALSA CLUB, A SALSA INSTRUCTOR, WEDDING DANCE, PRIVATE LESSONS, PERFORMANCES, SHOWS, SALSA CLASSES, SALSA CONGRESS, OR A SALSA SOCIAL? CUBAN, MIAMI, LA, NEW YORK</p>
<p>VISIT THE WEBSITE WWW.SALSAATL.COM FOR MORE DETAILS</p>
<p>CALL Sean-Christopher&nbsp; 770.855.4396</p>
<p><span>Extend your flexibility, work on your coordination, listen to music and have fun with</span> <a href="http://www.salsaatl.com/"><span>Salsa Atlanta</span></a></p>
<p>An opportunity to dance the salsa with style, strength and confidence. SalsaAtl.com's hour-long classes take place every Sunday and are designed to help beginners master their Cuban hip movement. However, if you've been practicing in front of your mirror for a while and feel ready to step it up, there are also advanced beginner and intermediate classes. All you need are comfortable clothes and dance sneakers or leather-soled shoes (heels are fine for females). Be as dressy as you want, but be forewarned: you're gonna sweat while you're learning your breaks and three-step weight changes. As a proud member of the Atlanta Salsa Meetup Group, SalsaAtl.com's classes could have you ready for the World Salsa Championships in no time.</p>
<p>S<span>alsa is a blend of melody, seduction, rhythm and, most of all, fun. You’ll learn step-by-step the intricate moves of your hips, legs, feet - and even that seductive stare (Ohh la la!). Build your stamina and perfect your steps as you and your partner go from Salsa novices to talented performers. You’ll reduce stress, increase energy, improve strength and muscle tone – all while being immersed in tradition, rhythm and entertainment.</span></p>
<p> <br> <a href="http://www.dancing4fun.com/">http://www.Dancing4Fun.com</a> <br> <a href="http://www.salsaatl.com/">http://www.SalsaATL.com</a>&nbsp; <br> <a href="https://www.facebook.com/Latindancinggwinnett"> https://www.facebook.com/Latindancinggwinnett</a> <br> <a href="http://www.meetup.com/dancing4fun/">http://www.meetup.com/dancing4fun/</a> <br> <a href="http://www.meetup.com/salsaatlanta/"> http://www.meetup.com/salsaatlanta/</a> <br> <a href="https://www.facebook.com/SalsaAtl">https://www.facebook.com/SalsaAtl</a> <br> <a href="https://www.facebook.com/Dancing4FunATL"> https://www.facebook.com/Dancing4FunATL</a> <br> <a href="http://www.twitter.com/SalsaATL">http://www.Twitter.com/SalsaATL</a> <br> <a href="http://www.instagram.com/SalsaATL">http://www.instagram.com/SalsaATL</a> <br> <a href="http://www.youtube.com/SalsaATL">http://www.youtube.com/SalsaATL</a> <br> <a href="http://www.salsaatthepark.com/">http://www.SalsaAtThePark.com</a> <br> <a href="http://www.newyearsevedanceparty.com/"> http://www.NewYearsEveDanceParty.com</a> <br> <a href="http://www.atlantahalloweenparty.com/"> http://www.AtlantaHalloweenParty.com</a> <br> <a href="http://www.valentinesdaydanceparty.com/"> http://www.ValentinesDayDanceParty.com</a>&nbsp; <br> <br> <a href="http://www.facebook.com/events/642075352562965/">http://www.facebook.com/events/642075352562965/&nbsp;</a> <br> Latin Dance classic <br> <a href="http://www.facebook.com/events/466794993474317/">http://www.facebook.com/events/466794993474317/&nbsp;</a> <br> Zombie Zoot Suite Roaring 20s Party Fri Oct 30th <br> <a href="http://www.facebook.com/events/1078330312183128/">http://www.facebook.com/events/1078330312183128/ </a> <br> Halloween Latin Dance Party Oct 31st <br> <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/688925767902004/">https://www.facebook.com/events/688925767902004/</a> <br> New Year's Eve Party Atlanta Dec 31, 2015</p>

max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Black Nonbelievers (BN)" data-testid="next-image" src="https://secure-content.meetupstatic.com/images/classic-events/494171201/178x178.jpg?w=178?w=384" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" srcset="https://secure-content.meetupstatic.com/images/classic-events/494171201/178x178.jpg?w=178?w=256 1x, https://secure-content.meetupstatic.com/images/classic-events/494171201/178x178.jpg?w=178?w=384 2x" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">Black Nonbelievers (BN)</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Atlanta, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Black Nonbelievers (BN)" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>You can visit our official website at <a href="http://blacknonbelievers.org/">blacknonbelievers.org</a>.</p>
<p>BN is a 501c3 nonprofit organization dedicated to providing an informative, caring, festive and friendly community. We connect with other Blacks (and allies) who are living free of religion and irrational beliefs who might otherwise be shunned by family and friends. Instead of accepting dogma, we determine truth and morality through reason and evidence.</p>
<p><i><b>Mission Statement &lt;br&gt; </b></i> The mission of Black Nonbelievers is to…<i><b> &lt;br&gt; </b></i> • Provide secular fellowship. &lt;br&gt; • Nurture and support nonbelievers in coming out. &lt;br&gt; • Promote atheist pride. &lt;br&gt; • Organize nonbelievers for charitable causes.</p>
<p><i><b>Meetings</b></i> &lt;br&gt; BN members meet to discuss topics relevant to secular living as well as to socialize. As a community we celebrate birthdays, holidays, and other occasions. We offer workshops and other gatherings to educate the public on the views of nonbelievers. We also facilitate a <i>Recovering from Religion (RfR)</i> group to assist those in need of support while questioning their faith or dealing with the challenges of leaving religion. See our <a href="http://blacknonbelievers.wordpress.com/calendar/">Calendar</a> for details on specific meetings and activities.</p>
<p>BN welcomes all regardless of sex, sexuality, gender identity, age, national origin, or race.</p>
<p>Visit our website at <a href="http://www.blacknonbelievers.org">www.blacknonbelievers.org</a></p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">654 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; </svg></div></div></div></button></div></div></a></div></div><div class="w-full"><div data-testid="group-card" class="py-3 border-t border-gray3 bg-white cursor-pointer flex flex-col"><a class="flex hover:no-underline" data-element-name="-groupCard" id="group-card-in-search-results" href="https://www.meetup.com/running-294/"><div class="d1xev8qx mr-4 relative hidden sm:block"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27178%27%20height=%27100%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Atlanta Running Meetup" data-testid="next-image" src="https://secure-content.meetupstatic.com/images/classic-events/467064040/178x178.jpg?w=178?w=384" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" srcset="https://secure-content.meetupstatic.com/images/classic-events/467064040/178x178.jpg?w=178?w=256 1x, https://secure-content.meetupstatic.com/images/classic-events/467064040/178x178.jpg?w=178?w=384 2x" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">Atlanta Running Meetup</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Atlanta, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="Atlanta Running Meetup" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p><b>Overview</b> &lt;br&gt;<br>OFFICIAL REOPENING DATE: MAY 22ND 2021</p> 
<p>We are a community that promotes exercise for both walkers and runners, and so much more. Atlanta Running Meetup is known for being very casual, warm, and friendly. Check us out on YouTube: <a href="http://youtu.be/nYecjOqrqfw"><b>Atlanta Running Meetup Video</b></a><a href="http://youtu.be/biQYW6vhJnQ">&lt;/a&gt;</a></p> 
<p>Since the inception of Atlanta Running Meetup in February of 2008, we have evolved into a thriving community that promotes friendships, networking opportunities, and yes, exercise. We are a grass roots community, and as such, we do not rely on any corporate sponsorships or advertising. We exist to promote community, friendships and exercise, not a specific product or company. Our logo was conceived and created by several members of our group. Many of you have expressed an interest in ordering running attire with our logo. Visit the following link for more information: <b><a>Running Attire with Atlanta Running Meetup Logo</a></b></p> 
<p>The majority of our runs take place in Piedmont Park. With the recent expansion of the park and Beltline, the park offers some fantastic scenery and running paths. We meet at Caribou Coffee to gather up and socialize before the run. Caribou Coffee is located at the corner of 10th St. &amp; Piedmont Ave (across the street from The Flying Biscuit). We leave Caribou promptly at 5 after the hour and head to the park. The routes are structured so that members can walk or run 2.5 or 5 miles, depending on personal preference. No one is left walking or running alone, unless they prefer that. One of the best parts of the morning is taking in a well deserved breakfast afterward with fellow walkers and runners. It's a relaxed and enjoyable opportunity to meet other like-minded people. Feel free to send me a message if you have any other questions. We go out of our way to make everyone feel welcome and accepted in this group. Come join us!</p> 
<p><b>Parking</b></p> 
<p>10th street, 11th street, 12th street, and Piedmont are options for parking, as well as side streets off of 10th Street like Myrtle St. Please DO NOT park your vehicle at Caribou while in the park, or any other surrounding businesses.</p> 
<p><b>Other Fantastic Running Groups</b>:</p> 
<p>Several members of this group either facilitate or attend other fantastic running groups: &lt;a href="http://www.meetup.com/running-294/pages/Other_Fantastic_Running_Groups/"&gt;Additional Running Groups</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">8567 members · Private<button tabindex="0" aria-label="Only members of this group can see its full content, including details about its members and events. Some information about the group is public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2718%27%20height=%2718%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="question" srcset="https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/Question.svg?w=32 1x, https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/Question.svg?w=48 2x" src="https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/Question.svg?w=48" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="w-full h-full" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"></span></button></div><button class="fill-current text-gray5 hover:text-gray6" aria-label="Share group" tabindex="0" data-element-name="groups-share-click" data-event-label="Share icon" data-testid="share-btn"><div class="flex items-center"><div id="share-in-group-search-results"><div><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" class="injected-svg fill-current" data-src="https://secure.meetupstatic.com/next/images/design-system-icons/share-outline.svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><title>icon</title>

Organizer is in Inman Park!</p><p>Typically, meetings are Monday or Tuesday evenings, with the occasional other day of the week. We always have 2 reads - some people read both, some choose just 1. All genres are fair game. We eat dinner and chat about books, but also TV, movies, work...anything, really. We may occasionally see movies or do related outings, too.</p><p>Join us if you're into reading and can meet up with us every few weeks!</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">573 members · Private<button tabindex="0" aria-label="Only members of this group can see its full content, including details about its members and events. display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="575 Social" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p><span>Welcome to 575-Social</span></p>
<p><span>This group is a place for fun and exciting friends to meet other interesting and fun individuals. We target the Interstate 575, Cobb,</span> <span><span>South</span> <span><span>Marietta</span> and <span><span>Woodstock.</span></span></span></span></p>
<p><span><span>Our target age group is the 25-55 crowd, although we do not turn away people outside of this age range. We know there are many people out there with who like to have fun...we just have to find them!</span></span></p>
<p><span><span>Please answer the questions so everyone knows if you are married, a single looking for friends or someone who is looking for that someone special.</span></span> Through the group and other methods many of us have found that someone special, but still want to remain active in one of <span>Atlanta</span> <span>’s most favorite groups.</span></p>
<p><span><span>575-Social is NOT a matchmaking or dating Meetup group. We are a safe atmosphere for friends to gather with no pressure and to have fun. Our Meetups are a great way to meet other OTPs with things in common and to develop lasting friendships and in some cases other long-lasting relationships. We plan LOTS of activities...so get up off your couch and come meet some new people at one of them.</span></span> <br> <br> </p>
<p><span><span>We welcome your comments and suggestions for Meetup ideas. Please click on Ideas to post a suggestion for us. Also, please feel e-mail any of the organizers with ideas and comments. You have joined the group...so help to make it ABOUT YOU! Give us ideas, come to the Meetups, and HAVE</span></span> <span><span>FUN</span></span></p>
<p><span><span>Target activities: Dinners, Trivia, Adventure, Outdoor Activities, Sports, Happy Hours, Wine Tastings,</span></span> <span><span>FUN</span></span></p>
<p><span><span>See you at a Meetup!</span></span></p>
<p><span>Ray</span></p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">2212 members · Private<button tabindex="0" aria-label="Only members of this group can see its full content, including details about its members and events. </svg></div></div></div></button></div></div></a></div></div><div class="w-full"><div data-testid="group-card" class="py-3 border-t border-gray3 bg-white cursor-pointer flex flex-col"><a class="flex hover:no-underline" data-element-name="-groupCard" id="group-card-in-search-results" href="https://www.meetup.com/North-Atlanta-Area-Outdoor-Group/"><div class="d1xev8qx mr-4 relative hidden sm:block"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27178%27%20height=%27100%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="North Atlanta Area Outdoor Group 35-60" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div><div class="flex flex-col overflow-hidden w-full"><div class="flex pb-4 justify-between"><div><h3 class="pb-0.25 text-xl font-semibold w-full whitespace-normal overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-3 hdv6t0" data-testid="group-card-title">North Atlanta Area Outdoor Group 35-60</h3><h3 class="pb-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-darkGold uppercase">Roswell, GA</h3></div><div class="d2wac42 ml-4 relative block sm:hidden"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; max-width: 100%;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; display: block; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%;"><img alt="" aria-hidden="true" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27135%27%20height=%2775%27/%3e" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; width: initial; height: initial; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"></span><img alt="North Atlanta Area Outdoor Group 35-60" data-testid="next-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="intrinsic" class="object-cover object-center rounded-md" style="position: absolute; inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>We are a group of friendly hikers age 35-60ish who like to get out on the local trails and on some weekends plan hikes that are further away. On occasion, we might do something other than hiking, such as kayaking, or a social event together.</p> 
<p>Do you like to get out and hike and want to make friends? Do you want to do so without having to wake up at the crack of dawn, having to worry about how fast the group is going to walk, or if you will be able to handle the miles? You have found the right group!</p> 
<p>We will have local hikes in the evenings after work, and on weekends starting no earlier than 9 am, often 10 or 11 am. We will occasionally plan hikes further out on the weekends that might require you to get up earlier to make the drive out to wherever we are going. &lt;br&gt;</p> 
<p>We hike at a speed that everyone in the group can keep up with. However, you will need to be able to maintain an average pace of 2 MPH so that we can finish the trails in the allotted timeframe for the event. If you tend to hike at a faster pace than that, you need to be willing to slow it down for the group if we have someone going a bit slower. We will also pause every now and then to snap photos, grab some water, or just enjoy the beautiful scenery.</p> 
<p>Well-behaved dogs are welcome to come on the trails that allow them. You must pick up after your dog, and carry it out off the trail.</p> 
<p>We will post the difficulty and miles of each hike we do. We will ask everyone to read the description and make sure they will be able to do the hike without difficulty. If you are not sure, please reach out to us before signing up.</p> 
<p>If you sign up for a hike, but then are unable to make it, or are running late, we ask that you change your RSVP, or contact the guide so we know you are not coming and the group is not waiting on you. Otherwise as a courtesy to everyone else; 'No shows' from previous events will be moved to waitlist on full events. Thanks for understanding.</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">1265 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; Kubernetes is an open source orchestration system for containers. It handles scheduling onto nodes in a compute cluster and actively manages workloads to ensure that their state matches the users declared intentions. Kubernetes can run almost anywhere, including Google Compute Engine, Vagrant, CoreOS, Azure, vSphere, RackSpace, etc. Learn more about Kubernetes at <a href="http://kubernetes.io" class="linkified">http://kubernetes.io</a></p>

<p><span>Potential activities include, but are not limited to: A) Bowling, B) Billiards, C) Movies, D) Paint balling, E) Miniature golf, F) Trap n Skeet, G) Team trivia, H) Driving range, I) Weekend trips, J) Archery, K) Dancing, and more (can't list all at moment).</span></p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">4842 members · Private<button tabindex="0" aria-label="Only members of this group can see its full content, including details about its members and events. Discussions will be technical but are open to people of all skill levels. Join the community and #LearnBitcoinTogether!

Many new and exciting things are happening in Bitcoin; don't be left behind! The future of money will be decentralized and this is the time to learn what the heck is going on. Our meetups cover a wide array of topics such as mining, programming, general education, privacy, lightning network, new upgrades and more.

We will have monthly FREE meetups. We additionally have focused workshops to help bring people up to speed in a classroom like setting.

* [Telegram Discussion](https://atlantabitdevs.org/telegram/)
* [Telegram Announcements](https://t.me/AtlantaBitDevsAnnouncements)
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/atlantabitdevs)

inset: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: auto; display: block; width: 0px; height: 0px; min-width: 100%; max-width: 100%; min-height: 100%; max-height: 100%;"><noscript></noscript></span></div></div><p class="pma6wzk m-0 pb-1 text-sm text-gray6 overflow-ellipsis line-clamp-2"><p>The Marietta Preppers Networking Group meets at the TruPrep store at 1000 Cobb Pkwy N Ste B, Marietta, GA 30062.</p>
<p>The purpose of the group is to share preparedness knowledge with new and seasoned Preppers and also to provide a safe place to network with fellow Preppers. The group is open to people of all levels of preparedness knowledge including those just getting started in prepping or even just curious about prepping.</p>
<p><i>The Meetups are broken down into:</i></p>
<p><b>Workshop:</b> <br></p>
<blockquote> 
 <p>• Free. Repeating schedule. Class setting.</p> 
</blockquote>
<p><b>Specialty Class:</b> <br></p>
<blockquote> 
 <p>• Cost will vary. Taught by a Specialist in his/her field.&nbsp;</p> 
</blockquote>
<p><b>Social:</b> <br></p>
<blockquote> 
 <p>• Free, Last Saturday of each month. Changing topics.&nbsp;</p> 
</blockquote>
<p><b>Hosted Events:</b></p>
<p>• We are happy to host events from third parties. &nbsp;If you are interested in have your event hosted at our location, please let us know.&nbsp;</p>
<p><span>The Workshops &amp; Socials are led by seasoned Preppers,&nbsp;</span><span>TruPrep&nbsp;</span><span>associates&nbsp;</span><span>Wes and David</span>&nbsp;</p>
<p>•&nbsp;Wes comes to Truprep from Prepper's Vault, where he successfully helped thousands in their preparedness journey. Wes has an active GA POST certification and spent several years working patrol with KSU PD. Whether it be building a bug out bag, traveling with portable solar, first responder medical, body armor or bushcrafting - Wes is your guy. &nbsp;</p>
<p>Wes loves to travel to events and seminars to speak and advise on Prepping, Preparing or Private Meetings.&nbsp;</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">1460 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; Atlanta vinyl record collectors it doesn't matter if you have just started your collection or have been collecting for decades. We invite you to join us for the monthly meetup to talk about all things vinyl then visit local shops to dig for records. If you enjoy meeting new people, talking about music in general, and of course going record shopping, then this is the meetup experience you are looking for. Each meetup we will have a general music theme to get the ball rolling. The mission statement of the group is to introduce music lovers to vinyl records, find like minded individuals and last but not least have fun.</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">86 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; We look forward to seeing you all so please make plans to join us!</strong></p><p><br></p><p>Welcome to the Roswell Insight Meditation Community!&nbsp;We are a <strong>teacher led</strong>&nbsp;<strong>community</strong> dedicated to cultivating greater understanding, compassion, and wisdom, through the teachings of the Buddha. We practice in the tradition of Insight Meditation, or Vipassana, which teaches methods for opening the heart and mind, and seeing more clearly into the true nature of our interconnected existence. We welcome practitioners from diverse spiritual and secular traditions. It is not necessary to become a “Buddhist” to participate in our community, and our tradition emphasizes our shared potential for awakening, rather than following a fixed system of beliefs.&nbsp;Please visit our web site at www.roswellinsightmeditation.org for more information.</p></p><div class="flex pt-6 text-sm text-gray6 w-full items-center justify-between"><div class="flex flex-row">569 members · Public<button tabindex="0" aria-label="This group’s content, including its members and event details, are visible to the public." class="flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-white w-5 h-5 m-0"><span style="box-sizing: border-box;
